azureLogAnalytics.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
| summarize TotalCores=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
| join ( 
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
    | summarize TotalUsedCores=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
) on x
|project now(), CpuPercentage=(TotalUsedCores / TotalCores) * 100

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
| summarize TotalMem=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
| join ( 
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
    | summarize TotalUsedMem=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
) on x
|project now(), MemPercentage=(TotalUsedMem / TotalMem) * 100

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
| summarize TotalMem=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
| join ( 
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryWorkingSetBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, * ) by Computer
    | summarize TotalUsedMem=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
) on x
|project now(), MemPercentage=(TotalUsedMem / TotalMem) * 100

Perf 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
| summarize count(), CpuTotal=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
| join kind = inner (
    Perf 
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    | summarize count(), CpuUsed=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
) on TimeForm
| order by TimeForm asc
|project make_datetime(TimeForm), Cpu=(CpuUsed / CpuTotal) * 100

Perf 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
| summarize count(), MemTotal=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
| join kind = inner (
    Perf 
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryWorkingSetBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    | summarize count(), MemUsed=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
) on TimeForm
| order by TimeForm asc
|project make_datetime(TimeForm), MemWorkingSet=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

Perf 
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
| summarize count(), MemTotal=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
| join kind = inner (
    Perf 
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend TimeForm = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    | summarize count(), MemUsed=sum(CounterValue) by TimeForm
) on TimeForm
| order by TimeForm asc
|project make_datetime(TimeForm), MemRss=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

KubeNodeInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| summarize nodecount=count() by Status
| project now(), nodecount, Status

KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name
| summarize podcount=count() by PodStatus
| project now(), podcount, PodStatus

KubeNodeInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize nodecount=count() by TimeGenerated

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize podcount=count() by TimeGenerated
| order by TimeGenerated asc

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "cpuAllocatableNanoCores" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| summarize TotalCores=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
| join kind = inner (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ClusterName == "$AKS"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project Name, ContainerName, Namespace
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project ContainerName, CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project Name, Namespace, CounterValue
    | summarize CoresPerNamespace=sum(CounterValue) by Namespace, x="join"
) on x
| project now(), Namespace, CpuPercentage=(CoresPerNamespace / TotalCores) * 100

panels.title: Cluster Cpu(by Allocatable) Utilization per Namespace

azureLogAnalytics.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "cpuAllocatableNanoCores" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| summarize TotalCores=sum(CounterValue), x="join"
| join kind = inner (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ClusterName == "$AKS"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project Name, ContainerName, Namespace
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | extend Time = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
        | project Time, ContainerName, CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project Time, Name, Namespace, CoresPerNamespace=CounterValue, x="join"  
) on x
| summarize CoresPerNamespace=sum(CoresPerNamespace) by Time, Namespace, TotalCores
| order by Time asc
| project make_datetime(Time), Namespace, CpuPercentage=(CoresPerNamespace / TotalCores) * 100

panels.title: Cluster Cpu(%)(by Allocatable) Utilization per Namespace

azureLogAnalytics.query:
KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName, Namespace
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | extend Time = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm")
    | project Time, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| summarize CoresPerNamespace=sum(CounterValue) by Time, Namespace
| order by Time asc
| project make_datetime(Time), Namespace, CoresPerNamespace / 1000000

azureLogAnalytics.query:

| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode" 
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes" 
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| summarize TotalMem=toreal(sum(CounterValue)), x="join"
| join kind = inner (
    KubePodInventory
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ClusterName == "$AKS"
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project Name, ContainerName, Namespace
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'memoryRssBytes'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1

        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project ContainerName, CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project Name, Namespace, CounterValue
    | summarize MemPerNamespace=sum(CounterValue) by Namespace, x="join"
) on x
| project now(), Namespace, MemPercentage=(MemPerNamespace / TotalMem) * 100

azureLogAnalytics.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Node=Computer, CPU=(CounterValue / 1000000000)

panels.description:
The AKS count is always in millicores.

1vCPU = 1000 millicores

azureLogAnalytics.query:
Perf
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Node=Computer, CPU=(CounterValue / 1000000000)

panels.title: CPU per Node (History)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, CpuTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind=inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, CpuUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CpuPercentageUsed=(CpuUsed / CpuTotal) * 100

Perf
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "cpuCapacityNanoCores"
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, CpuTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind=inner (
    Perf
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "cpuUsageNanoCores"
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, CpuUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CpuPercentageUsad=(CpuUsed / CpuTotal) * 100

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryCapacityBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Node=Computer, Memory=(CounterValue)

Perf
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Node=Computer, MemoryWorkingSet=(CounterValue)

Perf
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryWorkingSetBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Node=Computer, MemoryWorkingSet=(CounterValue)

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, MemTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemPercentageUsed=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

Perf
| where TimeGenerated > now(-2m)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, MemTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > now(-2m)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryWorkingSetBytes"
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemPercentageUsed=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

Perf
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, MemTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryWorkingSetBytes"    
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemPercentageUsad=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

Perf
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
| where CounterName == "memoryAllocatableBytes"
| where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project Computer, MemTotal=(CounterValue)
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == "K8SNode"
    | where CounterName == "memoryRssBytes"    
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemUsed=(CounterValue)
) on Computer
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, MemPercentageUsad=(MemUsed / MemTotal) * 100

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId like "$AKS"
| where Name == "used_percent"
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags)
| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterName"] == "$AKS"
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.device
| extend disk=strcat(device, "/" , hostName)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, disk, Val

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId like "$AKS"
| where Name == "used"
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags)
| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterName"] == "$AKS"
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.device
| extend disk=strcat(device, "/" , hostName)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, disk, Val

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId like "$AKS"
| where Name == "free"
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags)
| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterName"] == "$AKS"
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.device
| extend disk=strcat(device, "/" , hostName)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, disk, Val

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId like "$AKS"
| where Name == "bytes_recv"
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags)
| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterName"] == "$AKS"
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.interface
| extend hostInterface=strcat(device, "/" , hostName)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, hostInterface, Val

InsightsMetrics
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where _ResourceId like "$AKS"
| where Name == "bytes_sent"
| extend tags=todynamic(Tags)
| where tags["container.azm.ms/clusterName"] == "$AKS"
| extend hostName=tags.hostName
| extend device=tags.interface
| extend hostInterface=strcat(device, "/" , hostName)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, hostInterface, Val

KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'cpuLimitNanoCores'
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, CpuLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'cpuUsageNanoCores'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CpuUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
) on ContainerName
| order by Name asc
| project Name, CpuLimit=(CpuLimit / 1000000), CpuUsage=(CpuUsage / 1000000)

panels.description:
The AKS count is always in millicores.

1vCPU = 1000 millicores

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"

    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')

    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1

    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue

| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue / 1000000)

KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryLimitBytes'
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, MemLimit=CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by Name asc
| project Name, MemLimit

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryRssBytes'    
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue)

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryWorkingSetBytes'    
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, CounterValue
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, CounterValue=(CounterValue)

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryLimitBytes'
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, MemLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'memoryRssBytes'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemPercentage=(MemUsage / MemLimit) * 100
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, MemPercentage

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
| project Name, ContainerName
| join kind = inner (
    Perf
    | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
    | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
    | where CounterName == 'memoryLimitBytes'
    | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
    | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
    | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
    | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
    | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
    | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ContainerName
    | project ContainerName, MemLimit=CounterValue
    | join kind = inner (
        Perf
        | where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
        | where ObjectName == 'K8SContainer'
        | where CounterName == 'memoryWorkingSetBytes'
        | where InstanceName contains '$AKS'
        | extend ContainerNameParts = split(InstanceName, '/')
        | extend ContainerNamePartCount = array_length(ContainerNameParts)            
        | extend PodUIDIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 2, ContainerNameIndex = ContainerNamePartCount - 1 
        | extend ContainerName = strcat(ContainerNameParts[PodUIDIndex], '/', ContainerNameParts[ContainerNameIndex])
        | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemUsage=CounterValue
    ) on ContainerName
    | project TimeGenerated, ContainerName, MemPercentage=(MemUsage / MemLimit) * 100
) on ContainerName
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| project TimeGenerated, Name, MemPercentage

KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(30m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| where Namespace == "$Namespace"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name
| project Pod=Name, Namespace, PodStatus, Node=Computer, PodRestartCount, ContainerRestartCount, PodStartTime, ControllerKind

KubePodInventory
| where TimeGenerated > ago(2m)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Name
| summarize qtd=count() by Namespace
| project now(), Namespace, qtd

KubePodInventory
| where $__timeFilter(TimeGenerated)
| where ClusterName == "$AKS"
| summarize count() by TimeGenerated, Namespace
| order by TimeGenerated asc

list.definition: KubePodInventory | where ClusterName == "$AKS" | summarize count() by Namespace | project Namespace
list.name: Namespace
